scripts.xpostinstall: husky install && yarn lerna link && yarn npm:install && yarn rebuild
scripts.push: yarn build && git add . && git commit -m pre-release && git push && git pull
scripts.release: cd packages/code && yarn build && cd ../smart-monaco-editor && yarn build && cd ../.. && yarn push && lerna publish patch --yes && yarn push
scripts.build: cd packages/diff && yarn build && cd ../smart-monaco-editor && yarn build && cd ../.. && yarn lerna run build --parallel --since b && yarn copy
scripts.clean: lerna run clean && cd packages/smart-monaco-editor && yarn build
scripts.copy: rm -rf docs && mkdir -p docs/code && cp -a packages/zed-vision-site/public/. docs/ && cp -a packages/code/. packages/jsframe/lib/. docs/code/ && cp -a packages/diff/. docs/diff/ && rm -rf docs/code/.certs
scripts.rebuild: yarn lerna run clean --parallel && yarn build && yarn copy
scripts.docker:push: yarn docker:build && yarn lerna run docker:push --parallel
